item.description:
What say we get a walk in this Sunday at Millennium Park. We can meet at meet at Lot C at say 9:45AM, readying for a 10AM start. The weather tom'w looks fab.

And after the walk, natch, we can tool back to Panera, lungs refreshed, hearts aflutter, feet warmed up, blood coursing, and convene our convivial Sunday morning klatch knowing that we can absorb some carbs with the knowledge that we are replenishing, not adding to our daily calorie count.

With the short notice, if it doesn't work, let's give it a shot for next week...

Harvey
item.name: Short notice...walk
